Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli

Annotation Interface CliOption

@Target(FIELD) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface CliOption
Annotation to declare an option for the command line.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    description
    The description of the option used for help messages.
    String
    longOption
    The long option name.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    defaultValue
    The default value set at the annotated field, if an valueHint is specified, which is optional.
    String
    group
    The group to which this parameter option belongs to.
    boolean
    isRequired
    Defines, if this parameter (or group, if set) is a required parameter.
    String
    shortOption
    The short option name.
    String
    valueHint
    The name of the value for this option.

  • Element Details

    • longOption

      String longOption
      The long option name.

    • description

      String description
      The description of the option used for help messages.

    • shortOption

      String shortOption
      The short option name.
      Default:
      ""

    • valueHint

      String valueHint
      The name of the value for this option. Usually, all non-boolean options need such valueHint.
      Default:
      ""

    • defaultValue

      String defaultValue
      The default value set at the annotated field, if an valueHint is specified, which is optional.
      Default:
      ""

    • group

      String group
      The group to which this parameter option belongs to. Within a group, only one option must be used at most.
      Default:
      ""

    • isRequired

      boolean isRequired
      Defines, if this parameter (or group, if set) is a required parameter.
      Default:
      false
